name: Financial Institutions, Inc.
description: Financial Institutions, Inc. is a diversified financial services holding company based in the United States, primarily engaged in providing a wide range of banking and financial services through its subsidiary, the Bank of the Finger Lakes. Established in 1989, the company offers traditional banking services, including personal and commercial loans, deposit accounts, and wealth management solutions. FISI focuses on serving the needs of its local communities by providing personalized banking experiences and tailored financial solutions. Additionally, the company is dedicated to enhancing customer relationships through innovative technology, including online and mobile banking platforms. Financial Institutions, Inc. has a strong commitment to corporate responsibility, actively engaging in community development and supporting local initiatives. The company aims to uphold high standards of service and integrity while navigating the evolving financial landscape. With a strategic focus on growth and sustainability, Financial Institutions, Inc. continues to expand its presence in the financial sector while maintaining a customer-centric approach.

seo.meta_title: Financial Institutions, Inc. | Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Financial Institutions, Inc., a leader in banking and financial services dedicated to community-focused solutions and innovative technology.

faq.question: What services does Financial Institutions, Inc. offer?
faq.answer: Financial Institutions, Inc. offers personal loans, commercial loans, deposit accounts, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Financial Institutions, Inc.?
faq.answer: Martin J. McGowan is the CEO of Financial Institutions, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Financial Institutions, Inc. headquartered?
faq.answer: Financial Institutions, Inc. is headquartered in Auburn, New York, USA.

faq.question: When was Financial Institutions, Inc. founded?
faq.answer: Financial Institutions, Inc. was founded in 1989.
